formatted_address: 820 Thomson Road, #01-04 Mount Alvernia Medical Centre Blk A, Singapore 574623
name: SBCC Baby & Child Clinic (Cardiology & Paediatric Centre)

reviews.text: Dr Chan has been my the pedia for my kid ever since and it has always been a good experience. She has been very careful and very upfront. The staff are always cheerful and welcoming.

Both of my daughters consult Dr Chan and weâ€™re thankful for her expertise. All of our appointments are always seamless and fast. The nurses are very efficient and helpful. Thanks the team for your work!

Dr Chan displayed exceptional care for my little ones, offering patient and kind attention that immediately put them at ease. The three nurses consistently provided outstanding support during each visit, not only effectively managing the children but also going above and beyond to assist me when my hands were full. This made the entire experience stress-free and more manageable. I highly recommend this clinic for its excellent care, efficient service, and friendly atmosphere!

Dr Chan K.Y. has been our son's PD since birth. She's  proficient and kind and caring and does not over medicate. Her clinic is very well run. Appointments are usually timely and they don't allow for over booking at the expense of her patients unlike some pediatricians.

Doctor Chan is really a good and experienced doctor with a kind heart. She always ensures that my daughter is well and fully recovered. Gentle and made my daughter really comfortable with her. She even gave words of encouragement to my daughter which made us really touched. She is highly recommended! Lots of love for Doctor Chan!

vicinity: 820 Thomson Road, #01-04 Mount Alvernia Medical Centre Blk A
